title: The Twelve days of Christmas
brief_description: Stills from the picture book illustrated by Robert Broomfield and accompanied by the music and song. Jennifer Brown sings the lyrics as the geese, swans, doves, drummers, pipers, dancing ladies and the partridge all appear on screen.
